activities: Moreover receives user-ids, encrypted passwords and email addresses to authenticate users to our service. For our corporate clients we sometimes receive organization, country, division, department and location information for automatically generating template dashboards.

personaldata: Moreover receives user-ids, encrypted passwords and email address to authenticate users to our service. For our corporate clients we sometimes receive organization, country, division, department and location information for automatically generating template dashboards
privacyprograms: We adhere to AICPA Generally Accepted Privacy Principles and we also have a self-regulatory privacy program in place that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
